pullRequest.title: BlackDuck Project-User Sync
pullRequest.bodyText: When a Job is configured to filter by project, and Black Duck projects are selected for filtering, add the user of the Black Duck Global Config (i.e. the provider config) to the selected projects in Black Duck.

commit.message: Feat(BlackDuck): Create new distribution API action for after save/update
Feat(BlackDuck): Begin implementing threaded user-sync task
Feat(BlackDuck): Create separate class for project-user sync runnable
Chore: Add license headers to new files
Temp(BlackDuck): Make GET BlackDuck projects endpoint return data on-demand
Fix(BlackDuck): Remove project-user sync from BlackDuckDataSyncTask
Fix(BlackDuck): Check if there are any configured projects for a Job before querying the DB unnecessarily
Feat(BlackDuck): Remove unused method and related functionality from old data sync task

nodes.bodyText: @ekerwin Any current BlackDuck API solution for this?

This class name is a little confusing to me. Would it be better to call this AddUserToProject?  We know it is for Black Duck based on the package and Im not sure the suffix Runnable provides much value.
I think we can update blackduck-common and pass in a predicate to filter the projects by name. We should look for other places in Alert (if any) that we do this and update it there as well.
Any concern that we will cancel running tasks? What happens if someone uses a script to create 1000+ jobs at once. This would be churning a lot. What is the argument against just queuing them up?
The same functionality is in BlackDuckProviderDataAccessor, you might want to use that rather than implementing the same logic again here.
Won't we know the type of generic being passed here?

commit.message: Fix(Provider): Revert move of provider project custom function logic from web to provider sub-project

afterCommit.message: Fix(Provider): Revert move of provider project custom function logic from web to provider sub-project

commit.message: Refactor(BlackDuck): Rename project-user sync runnable class
Fix(BlackDuck): Determine max number of project-user sync tasks programmatically
Feat(BlackDuck): Remove asynchronous implementation of project-user adding (for now)
